column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This was so different than any other desserts I've ever had. It had the texture of egg pudding/flan and tasted like almond jello
column2: but it was TOFU..crazy I know! However
column3: that didn't stop me from eating it. It was chill
column5: airy and just sweet enough to balance out the warm salty flavor from the ramen earlier that night. Topped with bits of fruits and a dab of whipped cream! Yum!
